skills.name: HARBINGER
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Permanently Increase MAX HP of all allies by 25% if your are inflicted with Decreased MAX HP.
• Damage dealt does not wake targets inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.

skills.name: OMNIFIC
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 65% Chance to Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from each ally.
• Grant an Extra Turn to all allies if any enemy is inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.
• Damage dealt does not wake targets inflicted with Sleep or Perfect Sleep.

skills.name: LIMBO
desc: Gain Class Advantage against all enemies. Inflict Sleep on 2 random enemies if Regen HP status is present at the start of your turn.
